featured.text: Interestingly, when the volunteers expected only mild or moderate pain but experienced severe pain, they reported feeling 28 percent less pain than when they expected severe pain and actually got it.

definition.zh_def: 痛苦；身體或情感上的不適。
definition.en_def: A feeling of discomfort or suffering, either physical or emotional.
definition.example: She felt a sharp pain in her back after lifting the heavy box.
